title: Lillard out indefinitely due to blood clot in calf
description: Bucks guard Damian Lillard has been diagnosed with deep vein thrombosis in his right calf and is out indefinitely.
author: ESPN

title: Follow live: Heat hold control over Warriors in Butler's return to Miami
description: The Golden State Warriors take on the Miami Heat with Jimmy Butler returning to face the team that traded him in January.
author: ESPN

title: Mr Calm no more - Bellamy revels in Wales' chaos
description: Craig Bellamy shed his new 'Mr Calm' nickname after a wild conclusion to Wales' World Cup qualifier in North Macedonia.

title: Real in talks over finalising Alexander-Arnold signing
description: Real Madrid are in talks over finalising the signing of Liverpool full-back Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer this summer.

title: Thunder vs. Kings: Live updates, highlights for Tuesday's game
description: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Sacramento Kings: Live updates, highlights for Tuesday's game.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 9 - Ralph Kaplowitz (1947-48)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Kaplowitz wore only jersey No. 9 and put up 5.1 points per game.

title: What Trent's exit would mean for Liverpool... and Salah
description: Liverpool are facing the prospect of losing Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer at the end of the season as Real Madrid advance in talks over a move to take him to the Bernabeu.

title: Bold calls and driving standards - Tuchel stamping authority on England
description: Two from two for Thomas Tuchel, but no surprises there. England will make it comfortably to the World Cup finals, and they ought to win eight matches from eight in qualifying.
